channel.title: How to make or use some one elses client?
channel.description: i just started my server today, and i need a client. how to i make a client connect to my server? or how do i make a client

item.title: How to make or use some one elses client?
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

[quote=“lt ruls, post:5, topic:286337”]Server ip : Finallyltscape.sytes.net
Client :
http://uppit.com/v/7K6CGXRJ
http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=a30370510d404a9708f8df73f2072ed6e04e75f6e8ebb871

[left]
CREDITS:
30% to Me
30% to Tuts of google.org
40% to Figment for base

Credits for client
50% to Me
50% to Blurrr for base

Max Stat - 200
Max lvl - 255

::home

::yell

::suggest
Many more just do ::commands

::eat

*added Godwars
*new Home

*NO ATTACK OPTION IN NONWILD
*Deleted useless commands
*added quest
*1.04mb client.java Wink
*Made better antidupe (Thanks to Silabsoft Smiley )
*new skills
*Made 1 connection per ip to stop Hackers
*new commands such as ::fly for players

Dclaws and D plate added!

Mini Created by ME

Aggressive Godwars! Created by ME[/left]

was their a reason for posting this rubbish? the server ANd client of you'res suckes. you have you're website, remove it for advertising.

item.source: How to make or use some one elses client?

item.title: How to make or use some one elses client?
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

e l i t e:

i just started my server today, and i need a client. how to i make a client connect to my server? or how do i make a client

alright you can pretty much use any client, but ones that are closed, just go into the client.java of the client, and do CTRL+F and search “server ip” and change them to either 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1, those are the to ip adresses that connect to you’re server.

Read full topic
